description.value: Make an unarmed melee Strike against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] target. If it hits, until the end of your next turn the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} on a critical hit) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard].
